Relationship Context

These fields unlock when Person B is included.

Primary Relational Tiers (scope):
• Partner — full map access, including intimacy arcs & legacy patterns.
• Friend / Colleague — emotional, behavioral, social dynamics; intimacy overlays de-emphasized.
• Family — legacy patterns and behavioral overlays; sexual resonance suppressed.
• Acquaintance — light pattern echoes only; intimacy dynamics locked.

Transits

Selecting a relational mode will enable “Include Person B”.

Clinical toggle only; no narrative. If not applied, angles/houses remain natal.

Note: Midpoint here relocates houses to the geographic midpoint; Composite mode above creates the midpoint chart.
